text: wmn ealamat whdanyt allah wqdrth: 'anak taraa al'ard yabst la naba'at fyha, fa'iidha 'anzalna ealayha almatar dbbat fiha alhyat, wthrkt balnbat, wantfkht welt, 'iina aladhi 'ahya hadhih al'ard baed hmwdha, qadir ealaa 'iihya' alkhalq baed mwthm, 'iinah ealaa kl shay' qdyr, fkma la tejz qudratih ean 'iihya' al'ard baed mwtha, fkdhlk la tejz ean 'iihya' almwta
